name: Space Alien
description:
Yet again, Blob the alien's priceless gem has been stolen. He is furious because this is the second time his gem has been stolen. In order to get it back, he must go on a series of adventures throughout the galaxy, fighting enemies in UFO's throughout his quest.

It is up to you to decide whether you will betray Blob or help him...

Game includes:

- 20 super long levels
